content: “Methanolic Leaf Extract of Pericopsis Laxiflora (benth. Ex Baker) Meeuwen Protects Against Cadmium-Induced Testicotoxicity in Male Sprague-Dawley Rats via Antioxidant Capabilities”. Fountain Journal of Natural and Applied Sciences 14, no. 1 (June 12, 2025). Accessed December 29, 2025. https://fountainjournals.com/index.php/FUJNAS/article/view/688.
